comment: BaseCallOptions is an object to personalize how a call should behave

backCameraAsDefault.comment: if back camera should be the default

tags.property: if back camera should be the default

withBackCameraAsDefault.comment: This functions adds the option to use back camera as default.

withProximitySensorDisabled.comment:
This functions disables the usage of proximity sensor during calls.
It can be useful for custom devices such as smartglasses.
